long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You will love the game with its precise graphics and great gameplay, as well as great sounds. Come and experience!!
In this screenplay, you have omnipotent control of gravity which you must use to your advantage. Help guide the white ball through the chaos of dangerous red triangles while trying to revoke as many rubies as possible. Use your rubies to unlock sweet character skins for your player. Every time your ball makes it to the other side of the screen, you gain one point.


To swipe Install this extension to play Choose Gravity game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact with us support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
